sect1.title: Creating New Layers
sect1.para: There are several ways to create new layers in an image. Here are the most important ones:

listitem.para:
Selecting
Layer New Layerâ€¦
in the main menu. This brings up a dialog that allows you to set the basic properties of the new layer; see the New Layer dialog section for help with it.

Selecting
Layer Duplicate Layers
in the main menu. This creates a new layer, that is a perfect copy of the currently active layer, just above the active layer.

When you cut or copy something, and then paste it using CtrlV or
Edit Paste , the contents of the clipboard are pasted into a new layer.
